title: So Clash is broken
body:
Currently clash is running on the old map which includes missing bushes, alcoves and etc. The more problematic issue is that if you get an infernal dragon, the map changes don't go through and you can walk through walls :|

*Update, after winning all 3 games... yay I guess?, The following was discovered.

Infernal - Wall UI not displayed correctly resulting in walls that can be walked through. Some brushes are there but aren’t 

Ocean - Invisible brushes everywhere, the most broken in my opinion

Cloud - Nothing

Mountain - Annoying invisible walls every where.

Alcoves are also missing and the blue side brushes. Currently clash will be on tomorrow as well, please fix before then riot.

replies.body:
Clash isn't out yet wat
is it live on OCE?
yes it is. The map is completely broken for some apparent reason, it seems that Riot said they were ready for Clash beta but forgot to change the map
Crash is broken? What a surprise.
um we just had the ocean dragon and won obviously....... invis bushes... this is actually unfair on a large scale
But it affects everyone.  So it is actually fair, just frustrating.

> [{quoted}](name=Terozu,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RyKwi9EJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2019-12-07T17:47:40.254+0000)
>
> But it affects everyone.  So it is actually fair, just frustrating.

Not really. Some champs benefit more from bushes than others. If you have a lead, its easier to press because the losing team may not ward correctly due to invisible brushes and be less able to read the map.

Clash wasn't even out yet lmfao XD

Flaming riot just to flame lol
um.... well whats this new icon and match history say about it

I would have loved to have that happen to me, because my team and I were put inside another team (we were 10 in total) but we 5 couldn't play.
{{sticker:sg-lulu}}  I love Crash...
As if the rest of the game hasn't systematically been falling apart since H8 lol
